name: 1) Styrene -butadiene -methacrylic acid terpolymer
2-benzisothiazolin-3-one
disodium salt
FoodContactSubstance: (1) Styrene -butadiene -methacrylic acid terpolymer (CAS Reg. No. 9010-93-9), (2) 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 2634-33-5), and (3) sulfosuccinic acid 4-ester with polyethylene glycol dodecyl ether, disodium salt (CAS Reg. No. 39354-45-5).
